item.title: Jenkins pipelines with Kubernetes
item.author: radu@matei.ai (Radu Matei)
item.description: The goal of this article is to show you how to deploy Jenkins to your Kuberentes cluster using Helm and write Jenkins pipelines that execute builds within pods in your cluster - all of this while replicating your Jenkins configuration and persisting everything with Kubernetes persistent storage.
